name: df-bnd
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cbnd, cmpt(s0, universe, crab(s1, cfv(cmet, cv(s0)), wral(s2, cv(s0), wrex(s3, crp, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s2), cfv(cbl, cv(s1)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: âŠ¢ Bnd =(s0 âˆˆ ğ•Œ â†¦ { s1 âˆˆ(Met ` s0)| âˆ€(s2 âˆˆ s0, âˆƒ(s3 âˆˆ â„+, s0 =(s2[(ball ` s1)]s3)))})
comment: Define the class of bounded metrics. A metric space is bounded iff it can be covered by a single ball. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
